languages.text: "Будьте тверже, Леди-Навигатор. Выродок хочет, чтобы вы боялись — не давайте ему этого удовольствия".
languages.translation_comment:
Romance with Marazhai started; past the first romance event.
Cassia: "The decks of the ship were enveloped in alarming yellow and terrified green whenever Marazhai walked among the crew... but now the same colours flood my gaze when the Lord Captain appears on the bridge. I am... frightened by this change."

traits.locale_text: "Будьте тверже, Леди-Навигатор. Выродок хочет, чтобы вы боялись — не давайте ему этого удовольствия".

languages.text: "Steel yourself, Lady Navigator. The miscreant wants you to fear him — do not grant him that pleasure."
languages.translation_comment:
Romance with Marazhai started; past the first romance event.
Cassia: "The decks of the ship were enveloped in alarming yellow and terrified green whenever Marazhai walked among the crew... but now the same colours flood my gaze when the Lord Captain appears on the bridge. I am... frightened by this change."

languages.text: 「レディ・ナヴィゲイター、気を強く持ってください。あの悪党は、あなたが怯えるのを望んでいます。そんな喜びを与えてはなりません」
languages.original_text: "Steel yourself, Lady Navigator. The miscreant wants you to fear him — do not grant him that pleasure."

traits.locale_text: 「レディ・ナヴィゲイター、気を強く持ってください。あの悪党は、あなたが怯えるのを望んでいます。そんな喜びを与えてはなりません」

languages.text: "Stählt Euch, Lady Navigator. Die Missgeburt möchte, dass Ihr ihn fürchtet. Verwehrt ihm diese Genugtuung."
languages.original_text: "Steel yourself, Lady Navigator. The miscreant wants you to fear him — do not grant him that pleasure."

traits.locale_text: "Stählt Euch, Lady Navigator. Die Missgeburt möchte, dass Ihr ihn fürchtet. Verwehrt ihm diese Genugtuung."

languages.text: « Armez-vous de courage, dame navigatrice. Ce scélérat veut que vous le craigniez ; il ne faut pas lui donner ce plaisir. »
languages.original_text: "Steel yourself, Lady Navigator. The miscreant wants you to fear him — do not grant him that pleasure."

traits.locale_text: « Armez-vous de courage, dame navigatrice. Ce scélérat veut que vous le craigniez ; il ne faut pas lui donner ce plaisir. »

languages.text: «Sea fuerte, lady navegante. El bellaco quiere que le tema; no le dé esa satisfacción».
languages.original_text: "Steel yourself, Lady Navigator. The miscreant wants you to fear him — do not grant him that pleasure."

traits.locale_text: «Sea fuerte, lady navegante. El bellaco quiere que le tema; no le dé esa satisfacción».

languages.text: “坚强起来，导航者女士。那个渣滓想让你怕他，不要让他得逞。”
languages.original_text: "Steel yourself, Lady Navigator. The miscreant wants you to fear him — do not grant him that pleasure."

traits.locale_text: “坚强起来，导航者女士。那个渣滓想让你怕他，不要让他得逞。”

languages.text: "Hazırlıklı ol Leydi Rotacı. İstediği ondan korkman, o aşağılığa bu zevki yaşatma."
languages.original_text: "Steel yourself, Lady Navigator. The miscreant wants you to fear him — do not grant him that pleasure."
